ai-anya-e0703n41:456_0: Then the lord of the earth, having come here from Jambudīpa,
ai-anya-e0703n41:457_0: said this to the great army: “Dearing the strength of her arm,
ai-anya-e0703n41:459_0: Through wearing a good rich cloth he sent by Askkadhamma,
ai-anya-e0703n41:460_0: attacked the twelve-hundred kings of (Buddha) Kāsi,
ai-anya-e0703n41:462_0: it is the right way to its wives, having a share to the simile.
ai-anya-e0703n41:463_0: and the great hermit from Jambudīpa, fearlessly,
ai-anya-e0703n41:467_0: That’s why a delightful one meditates.
ai-anya-e0703n41:468_0: with great wisdom, you’ll be constrained in Dhamma.
ai-anya-e0703n41:469_0: For the benefit of many people in the world, which was prepared for the benefit of the great sacrifice,
ai-anya-e0703n41:471_0: The group of forty-four itelf is finished.
